column1: Table 6:  Women under the jurisdiction of State or Federal correctional authorities, yearend 1995, 2002, and 2003
Authors:  Paige M. Harrison and Allen J. Beck
Table 6. Women under the jurisdiction of State or Federal correctional authorities, yearend 1995, 2002, and 2003
a/The average annual percent increase from 1995 to 2003.
b/The number of female prisoners with sentences of more than 1 year per 100,000 female U.S. residents.
c/Growth in reporting from 1995 to 2003 may be slightly overestimated due to a change in reporting from custody to jurisdiction counts.
